book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And these are the people of the land that went up, of the number of prisoners who were removed, whom Nabuchodonosor king of Babylon carried away to Babylon, and they returned to Juda and Jerusalem, every man to his city;

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: who came with Zorobabel: Jesus, Neemias, Saraias, Reelias, Mardochæus, Balasan, Masphar, Baguai, Reum, Baana. The number of the people of Israel:

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Phares, two thousand one hundred and seventy-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Saphatia, three hundred and seventy-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Ares, seven hundred and seventy-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Phaath Moab, belonging to the sons of Jesue and Joab, two thousand eight hundred and twelve.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Ælam, a thousand two hundred and fifty-four.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Zatthua, nine hundred and forty-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Zacchu, seven hundred and sixty.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Banui, six hundred and forty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Babai, six hundred and twenty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Asgad, a thousand two hundred and twenty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Adonicam, six hundred and sixty-six.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Bague, two thousand and fifty-six.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Addin, four hundred and fifty-four.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Ater the son of Ezekias, ninety-eight.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Bassu, three hundred and twenty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Jora, a hundred and twelve.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Asum, two hundred and twenty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Gaber, ninety-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Bethlaem, a hundred and twenty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Netopha, fifty-six.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Anathoth, a hundred and twenty-eight.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Azmoth, forty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Cariathiarim, Chaphira, and Beroth, seven hundred and forty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Rama and Gabaa, six hundred and twenty-one.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The men of Machmas, a hundred and twenty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The men of Bæthel and Aia, four hundred and twenty-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Nabu, fifty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Magebis, a hundred and fifty-six.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Elamar, a thousand two hundred and fifty-four.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Elam, three hundred and twenty.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Lodadi and Ono, seven hundred and twenty-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Jericho, three hundred and forty-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Senaa, three thousand six hundred and thirty.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And the priests, the sons of Jedua, belonging to the house of Jesus, were nine hundred and seventy-three.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Emmer, a thousand and fifty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Phassur, a thousand two hundred and forty-seven.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of Erem, a thousand and seven.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And the Levites, the sons of Jesus and Cadmiel, belonging to the sons of Oduia, seventy-four.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The sons of Asaph, singers, a hundred and twenty-eight.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of the porters, the children of Sellum, the children of Ater, the children of Telmon, the children of Acub, the children of Atita, the children of Sobai, in all a hundred and thirty-nine.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The Nathinim: the children of Suthia, the children of Asupha, the children of Tabaoth,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the sons of Cades, the children of Siaa, the children of Phadon,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Labano, the children of Agaba, the sons of Acub,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Agab, the children of Selami, the children of Anan,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Geddel, the children of Gaar, the children of Raia,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Rason, the children of Necoda, the children of Gazem,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Azo, the children of Phase, the children of Basi,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Asena, the children of Moünim, the children of Nephusim,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Bacbuc, the children of Acupha, the children of Arur,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Basaloth, the children of Mauda, the children of Arsa,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Barcos, the children of Sisara, the children of Thema,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Nasthie, the children of Atupha.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: The children of the servants of Solomon: the children of Sotai, the children of Sephera, the children of Phadura,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Jeela, the children of Darcon, the children of Gedel,

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Saphatia, the children of Atil, the children of Phacherath, the children of Aseboim, the children of Emei.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: All the Nathanim, and the sons of Abdeselma were three hundred and ninety-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And these are they that went up from Thelmelech, Thelaresa, Cherub, Hedan, Emmer: and they were not able to tell the house of their fathers, and their seed, whether they were of Israel:

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: the children of Dalæa, the children of Bua, the children of Tobias, the children of Necoda, six hundred and fifty-two.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And of the children of the priests, the children of Labeia, the children of Akkus, the children of Berzellai, who took a wife of the daughter of Berzellai the Galaadite, and was called by their name.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: These sought their genealogy as though they had been reckoned, but they were not found; and they were removed, as polluted , from the priesthood.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And the Athersastha told them that they should not eat of the most holy things, until a priest should arise with Lights and Perfections.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And all the congregation together were about forty-two thousand three hundred and sixty;

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: besides their men-servants and maid-servants, and these were seven thousand three hundred and thirty-seven: and among these were two hundred singing men and singing women.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: Their horses were seven hundred and thirty-six, their mules, two hundred and forty-five.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: Their camels, four hundred and thirty-five; their asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: And some of the chiefs of families, when they went into the house of the Lord that was in Jerusalem, offered willingly for the house of God, to establish it on its prepared place.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: According to their power they gave into the treasury of the work pure gold sixty-one thousand pieces, and five thousand pounds of silver, and one hundred priests' garments.

book: Brenton Septuagint Translation Ezra and Nehemiah 2
text: So the priests, and the Levites, and some of the people, and the singers, and the porters, and the Nathinim, dwelt in their cities, and all Israel in their cities.
